::WindRider::
Growing anxious, WindRider decides to fly the short
distance to the Cybertronian Fire and does not wait
for a response to his transmission. Upon approaching
the CF, he sees three Maximals at the main hatch. He
transforms to robot mode and lands in front of them.
Smiling, he says "Hi Im WindRider. My transport was
destroyed and I ended up here. I saw your ship, and
decided to come and ask if I could join you bots."
